story:
Als je alleen een DONATIE wil doen, gebruik dan de bovenste optie hiernaast op de pagina.  Die knop heet CONTRIBUTE NOW.
Mocht het niet lukken via de aangeboden betaal-optie om bij te dragen en wil je wel meedoen? Mail me dan op info@zelfbewustzwanger.nl dan zoeken we samen naar een manier om wel bij te kunnen dragen! Dank!

Short Summary

Zelfbewustzwanger.nl is an organization that wants to strengthen the voice of pregnant women and their partners in the Netherlands. We want to achieve this by providing an online learning program with informative videos. Pregnant women will be supported in their journey towards strong self consciousness, trust. This will strengthen them by making choices. The right choices for themselves, their partners, their unborn child. Hence, the start of a new life will be based on self consciousness, on trust.

Currently, the voice of pregnant women is not heard properly by policy makers and other stakeholders deciding on the organization of birth care in the Netherlands. This is something we passionately want to change. Zelfbewustzwanger.nl is set up to make the difference.

The videos will be available for FREE for pregnant women,  so that as many women as possible have access to the program. In order to finance this project, we need your support. Therefore, we start this crowd funding campaign. If you want to join this campaign, if you want to help us out, please select a perk! For 15 euro's your first name will be displayed on our website. Your donation will be used to help us create the awareness of our offer to pregnant women. Thank you for making a change!!

For 750 euro you are a change maker! Choose your own video and your name will be showed at the end of the video, so that everyone knows you are a change maker!

Would you like to have more information, take a look at www.zelfbewustzwanger.nl (In Dutch).

If you feel this might be interesting for other people you know, we encourage you to share this message with them. You will help this initiative to grow and prosper!

Please leave a comment down below!

Many thanks!


Korte samenvatting 

Zelfbewustzwanger.nl is een organisatie die een beweging inzet: versterken van de stem van de zwangere en hun partners.

Hoe?

  1. Door een dynamisch online programma te ontwikkelen met informatieve video’s, handvatten, oefeningen over datgene waarvan de zwangeren zèlf hebben aangegeven dat er behoefte aan is
  2. Door het opzetten van een platform van waaruit de stem van de zwangeren en hun partners ingebracht/gehoord kan worden (bij beleidsmakers).  

Als een zwangere:

  • weet wat er te kiezen is,
  • de keuzes maakt die voor haar (gezondheid en welzijn) goed zijn,
  • een gevoel van regie ervaart tijdens haar bevalling,

vergroot dat haar kansen op een optimale bevalling, of dat nou thuis is, in een geboortehuis of in een ziekenhuis. 

Wil JIJ meedoen om ervoor te zorgen dat de geboortezorg verbetert? Betere zorg, minder kosten, maar vooral meer gelukkige zelfverzekerde en gezonde moeders en betrokken partners die ervoor zorgen dat hun baby’s vanuit vertrouwen kunnen beginnen aan hun levensreis! 

Doneer dan en kies een van deze leuke beloningen als dank voor jouw steun!

Dan gaan wij aan de slag de video's te maken.  Hiermee geven we zwangere vrouwen en hun partners 20 weken lang zicht op welke keuzes ze kunnen maken. We helpen week na week verder te bouwen aan een krachtig zelfvertrouwen! 

Waarom is jouw hulp nodig?

Door het GRATIS aan te bieden en te ontwikkelen in samenwerking met professionals, creëren we aansprekende en betrouwbare inhoud voor de video’s. Hierdoor kunnen veel zwangere vrouwen die behoefte hebben aan dit programma bereiken.

Jouw bijdrage maakt het mogelijk om: 

  • De productiekosten van de video’s te kunnen betalen.
  • Een online Academy te kunnen bouwen waar het online programma straks op aangeboden kan worden.
  • Ervoor te zorgen dat de zwangeren weten dat dit programma er voor ze is en het gaan gebruiken.
  • Te starten met het creëren van een platform van waaruit de stem van de zwangeren en hun partners ingebracht/gehoord kan worden.
Ons crowdfunding doel hebben we gesteld op 25.000 euro. Dat dekt de kosten en maakt t mogelijk om door te gaan met het bouwen aan een community.

Jouw beloning:

Voor 100 euro ben je erbij op 12 juli! Een onvergetelijke middag met leuke workshops. Laat je lekker masseren of verken wat Rebozo voor jou kan betekenen. Geniet van schitterende hartverwarmende muziek!

Voor 750 euro adopteer je jouw eigen video! Bij de aftiteling van de video laten we jouw naam in beeld zien! Zodat iedereen weet dat jij het financieel mogelijk hebt gemaakt die video te maken zodat de zwangere er GRATIS naar kan kijken. Wat een kans!

Of kies een van de andere leuke beloningen. Voor 15 euro zetten we jouw voornaam bij ons op de website voor een warm dankjewel voor jouw steun.

Kies jij graag voor een bepaalde beloning, maar wil je graag meer doneren? Dat kan! Je kan zelf bepalen hoeveel geld je doneert!

Ook als je wel wilt geven, maar daar geen beloning voor terug wilt, kun je geven. 

 

Grote impact

Er is een groeiende angst onder zwangere vrouwen. Uit ons onderzoek blijkt dat jonge zwangere vrouwen significant vaker angstiger zijn over het verloop van hun zwangerschap en dat ze zich zorgen maken over het verliezen van de regie tijdens de bevalling.

En dat terwijl ze juist zo graag gezond, gelukkig en ontspannen willen beginnen aan het moederschap!

Zwangere vrouwen geven aan dat het lastig is om in beeld te krijgen van wat er allemaal te kiezen is. 

En het vraagt nogal wat om voor je keuzes te gaan staan. Mede hierdoor gaat het niet altijd zoals gewenst en ontstaat er achteraf teleurstelling.

Dat is zó jammer! En onnodig. Want het kan écht anders.

Daarom is dit initiatief zelfbewustzwanger gestart.  Samen van angst naar vertrouwen.

Door bij de basis te beginnen.

Door zwangere vrouwen te bekrachtigen. Zodat elke vrouw die beslissingen kan maken, die het beste zijn voor haarzelf en haar kind, gesteund door haar partner. Zodat de kersverse ouders straks terugkijken vanuit gevoel van geluk en trots, tevreden met de keuzes die zijn gemaakt. En hun baby’s vanuit vertrouwen kunnen beginnen aan hun levensreis! 

Zou dat niet gaaf zijn....? Met jouw steun wordt dat mogelijk!

Maar er is nog meer...! Jouw hulp creëert nog meer impact.


Op papier staat de zwangere centraal. Hoe ziet de praktijk eruit?

De stem van de zwangere is landelijk onvoldoende vertegenwoordigd in de discussies rond goede geboortezorg.

Zwangerschap is geen ziekte. Maar zwangeren zijn wel gebruikers van een belangrijk deel van deze zorgdienstverlening.

Wat blijkt?

Als er een sterke vertegenwoordiging is van de gebruikers van de zorg, ontstaat vernieuwing en verbetering van beleid. Het longfonds en de brandwondenstichting zijn hier succesvolle voorbeelden van.

Dit is ook belangrijk voor de geboortezorg! Juist nu Nederland de geboortezorg anders wil gaan inrichten met één budget voor zowel gynaecologen als de verloskundigen. De stoel van de zwangere aan deze tafel van beleidsmakers in de geboortezorg mag niet leeg blijven!

Door het opzetten van dit platform zelfbewustzwanger zorgen we ervoor dat de stem van de zwangeren en hun partners ingebracht en gehoord kan worden bij beleidsmakers.


Wie zit er achter zelfbewustzwanger?


Floor Molkenboer in de eerste plaats moeder! Ik heb bedrijfskunde gestudeerd. Ik ben professioneel coach vrouwelijk leiderschap & leiderschapsontwikkeling èn initiatiefneemster van zelfbewustzwanger.nl . Op verschillende manieren  ben ik betrokken geraakt bij de geboortezorg: als ‘gebruiker’, als trainer/coach voor zorgprofessionals en als adviseur voor zorgorganisaties. Mijn droom is om in de geboortezorg de kracht van vertrouwen te versterken.

Zwanger zijn is bij uitstek een periode in je leven waar het gaat om het inzetten van vrouwelijk leiderschap! Ik deel graag mijn expertise als coach vrouwelijk leiderschap om zwangere vrouwen te ondersteunen bij het bouwen aan een krachtig zelfvertrouwen.

Ik werk samen met een fantastisch team. Daarnaast zijn inhoudelijk ook betrokken bij het materiaal en de positionering van dit initiatief mijn adviseurs: Elske Feitsma (moeder, zwanger, yogadocent) Jeroen van Dillen (vader, gynaecoloog), Angela Verbeeten (moeder, verloskundige JUNO), Maike Gregoor (moeder, directeur Kraamzorg Liemerscare), Kim Boersma (moeder, adviseur conceptontwikkeling en positionering).


Ons plan van aanpak?

Welke stappen gaan we zetten?

Afgelopen 3 maanden hebben ruim 600 zwangeren en reeds bevallen vrouwen en hun partners aangegeven waar het online programma wat hun betreft over moet gaan. Er staat een team van professionals klaar om circa 20 video’s te gaan ontwikkelen en opnemen.

Projectplanning:

12 JUNI: lancering crowdfunding

15 JUNI-6 JULI: ontwikkelen en opnemen van de video’s. Bouwen van de online Academy waar het programma straks gaat draaien.

12 JULI: Een feest ter ere van alle zelfbewuste zwangeren en hun partners. Het moment waarop het online programma gelanceerd wordt!


Waarom verdient zelfbewustzwanger jouw steun? Deze mensen geven antwoord:

Sabrina Reinders, nu 8 maanden zwanger! "Ik steun dit initiatief om een aantal redenen: Elke zwangerschap is anders. Elke zwangerschap is ook weer spannend. Ik vind het belangrijk dat vrouwen bewust zwanger kunnen zijn en ook vol zelfvertrouwen. Dat gaat dit programma bieden. Door vrouwen elke week, elke dag bij te helpen."

Jeroen van Dillen, gynaecoloog en vader van 4 kinderen: “Ik ondersteun dit initiatief om twee redenen: Ten eerste helpt het jonge ouders om bewust vorm te geven aan hun eigen zwangerschap en bevalling. Ten tweede helpt het ons zorgverleners aan de stem van de jonge ouders”.

Angela Verbeeten: “Als verloskundige streef ik ernaar dat moeders en vaders goed terug kunnen kijken naar de geboorte van hun kind. Daarom steun ik dit initiatief, want dit gaat ouders daarbij helpen!”

Maike Gregoor, kraamzorg LiemersCare: “Ik ondersteun dit initiatief omdat ik het belangrijk vind dat zwangeren weten dat ze een keuze mogen maken.  En hierdoor met meer vertrouwen het ouderschap ingaan.”


Ook Jessica Mendel, Actrice en tv-presentatrice, bekend bij het Nederlandse publiek doordat ze het programma CampingLife een aantal jaar presenteerde, zet zich in voor zelfbewustzwanger!

"Ik ben Jessica Mendels.  Momenteel zwanger van ons tweede kindje. Ik weet sinds kort dat ik diabetes heb. En daarom is het nog belangrijker dat ik goed op mijn gezondheid en rust let, om ook dit kindje gezond en wel op de wereld te zetten. Om mij heen hoor ik vaak dat andere zwangere vrouwen worstelen bij het maken van keuzes. Er zijn heel veel keuzes te maken. Daarom vind ik zelfbeustzwanger.nl zo’n goed initiatief! Zij helpen juist de vrouwen bij het maken van de juiste keuzes voor henzelf. Steun ook zelfbewustzwanger en doneer. Kies een van de beloningen hier op de website. Als mijn zwangerschap het toelaat zien we elkaar 12 juli bij het feest waar we vieren dat we allemaal zelfbewustzwanger zijn en waar ook de partners welkom zijn!"
story_txt:
Als je alleen een DONATIE wil doen, gebruik dan de bovenste optie hiernaast op de pagina.  Die knop heet CONTRIBUTE NOW.

Mocht het niet lukken via de aangeboden betaal-optie om bij te dragen en wil je wel meedoen? Mail me dan op info@zelfbewustzwanger.nl dan zoeken we samen naar een manier om wel bij te kunnen dragen! Dank!
Short Summary



Zelfbewustzwanger.nl is an organization that wants to strengthen the voice of pregnant women and their partners in the Netherlands. We want to achieve this by providing an online learning program with informative videos. Pregnant women will be supported in their journey towards strong self consciousness, trust. This will strengthen them by making choices. The right choices for themselves, their partners, their unborn child. Hence, the start of a new life will be based on self consciousness, on trust.
Currently, the voice of pregnant women is not heard properly by policy makers and other stakeholders deciding on the organization of birth care in the Netherlands. This is something we passionately want to change. Zelfbewustzwanger.nl is set up to make the difference.
The videos will be available for FREE for pregnant women,  so that as many women as possible have access to the program. In order to finance this project, we need your support. Therefore, we start this crowd funding campaign. If you want to join this campaign, if you want to help us out, please select a perk! For 15 euro's your first name will be displayed on our website. Your donation will be used to help us create the awareness of our offer to pregnant women. Thank you for making a change!!
For 750 euro you are a change maker! Choose your own video and your name will be showed at the end of the video, so that everyone knows you are a change maker!
Would you like to have more information, take a look at www.zelfbewustzwanger.nl (In Dutch).
If you feel this might be interesting for other people you know, we encourage you to share this message with them. You will help this initiative to grow and prosper!
Please leave a comment down below!
Many thanks!

Korte samenvatting 





Zelfbewustzwanger.nl is een organisatie die een beweging inzet: versterken van de stem van de zwangere en hun partners.
Hoe?

Door een dynamisch online programma te ontwikkelen met informatieve video’s, handvatten, oefeningen over datgene waarvan de zwangeren zèlf hebben aangegeven dat er behoefte aan is
Door het opzetten van een platform van waaruit de stem van de zwangeren en hun partners ingebracht/gehoord kan worden (bij beleidsmakers).  




Als een zwangere:



weet wat er te kiezen is,
de keuzes maakt die voor haar (gezondheid en welzijn) goed zijn,
een gevoel van regie ervaart tijdens haar bevalling,

vergroot dat haar kansen op een
optimale bevalling, of dat nou thuis is, in een geboortehuis of in een
ziekenhuis. 
Wil JIJ meedoen om ervoor te zorgen dat
de geboortezorg verbetert? Betere zorg, minder kosten, maar vooral meer
gelukkige zelfverzekerde en gezonde moeders en betrokken partners die ervoor
zorgen dat hun baby’s vanuit vertrouwen kunnen beginnen aan hun
levensreis! 
Doneer dan en kies een van deze leuke beloningen als dank voor jouw
steun!
Dan gaan wij aan de slag de video's te maken.  Hiermee geven
we zwangere vrouwen en hun partners 20 weken lang zicht op welke keuzes ze
kunnen maken. We helpen week na week verder te bouwen aan een krachtig
zelfvertrouwen! 



Waarom is jouw hulp nodig?
Door het GRATIS
aan te bieden en te ontwikkelen in samenwerking met professionals, creëren we
aansprekende en betrouwbare inhoud voor de video’s. Hierdoor kunnen veel
zwangere vrouwen die behoefte hebben aan dit programma bereiken.
Jouw bijdrage maakt het mogelijk om: 

De
     productiekosten van de video’s te kunnen betalen. 
Een online
     Academy te kunnen bouwen waar het online programma straks op aangeboden
     kan worden. 
Ervoor te zorgen
     dat de zwangeren weten dat dit programma er voor ze is en het gaan
     gebruiken. 
Te starten met
     het creëren van een platform van waaruit de stem van de zwangeren en hun
     partners ingebracht/gehoord kan worden.

Ons crowdfunding doel hebben we gesteld op 25.000 euro. Dat dekt de kosten en maakt t mogelijk om door te gaan met het bouwen aan een community.




Jouw beloning:Voor 100 euro
ben je erbij op 12 juli! Een onvergetelijke middag met leuke workshops. Laat je
lekker masseren of verken wat Rebozo voor jou kan betekenen. Geniet van
schitterende hartverwarmende muziek!

Voor 750 euro
adopteer je jouw eigen video! Bij de aftiteling van de video laten we jouw naam
in beeld zien! Zodat iedereen weet dat jij het financieel mogelijk hebt gemaakt
die video te maken zodat de zwangere er GRATIS naar kan kijken. Wat een kans!
Of kies een van de andere leuke beloningen. Voor 15 euro zetten we jouw voornaam bij ons op de website voor een warm dankjewel voor jouw steun.
Kies jij graag voor een bepaalde beloning, maar wil je graag meer doneren? Dat kan! Je kan zelf bepalen hoeveel geld je doneert!
Ook als je wel wilt geven, maar daar geen beloning voor terug wilt, kun je geven. 
 

Grote impact


Er is een groeiende angst onder zwangere vrouwen. Uit ons onderzoek blijkt dat jonge zwangere vrouwen significant vaker angstiger zijn over het verloop van hun zwangerschap en dat ze zich zorgen maken over het verliezen van de regie tijdens de bevalling.
En dat terwijl ze juist zo graag gezond, gelukkig en ontspannen willen beginnen aan het moederschap!
Zwangere vrouwen geven aan dat het lastig is om in beeld te krijgen van wat er allemaal te kiezen is. 
En het vraagt nogal wat om voor je keuzes te gaan staan. Mede hierdoor gaat het niet altijd zoals gewenst en ontstaat er achteraf teleurstelling.
Dat is zó jammer! En onnodig. Want het kan écht anders.
Daarom is dit initiatief zelfbewustzwanger gestart.  Samen van angst naar vertrouwen.
Door bij de basis te beginnen.
Door zwangere vrouwen te bekrachtigen. Zodat elke vrouw die beslissingen kan maken, die het beste zijn voor haarzelf en haar kind, gesteund door haar partner. Zodat de kersverse ouders straks terugkijken vanuit gevoel van geluk en trots, tevreden met de keuzes die zijn gemaakt. En hun baby’s vanuit vertrouwen kunnen beginnen aan hun levensreis! 
Zou dat niet gaaf zijn....? Met jouw steun wordt dat mogelijk!
Maar er is nog meer...! Jouw hulp creëert nog meer impact.

Op papier staat de zwangere centraal. Hoe ziet de praktijk eruit?

De stem van de zwangere is landelijk onvoldoende vertegenwoordigd in de discussies rond goede geboortezorg.Zwangerschap is geen ziekte. Maar zwangeren zijn wel gebruikers van een belangrijk deel van deze zorgdienstverlening.
Wat blijkt?
Als er een sterke vertegenwoordiging is van de gebruikers van de zorg, ontstaat vernieuwing en verbetering van beleid. Het longfonds en de brandwondenstichting zijn hier succesvolle voorbeelden van.
Dit is ook belangrijk voor de geboortezorg! Juist nu Nederland de geboortezorg anders wil gaan inrichten met één budget voor zowel gynaecologen als de verloskundigen. De stoel van de zwangere aan deze tafel van beleidsmakers in de geboortezorg mag niet leeg blijven!
Door het opzetten van dit platform zelfbewustzwanger zorgen we ervoor dat de stem van de zwangeren en hun partners ingebracht en gehoord kan worden bij beleidsmakers.



Wie zit er achter zelfbewustzwanger?




Floor Molkenboer in de eerste plaats moeder! Ik heb bedrijfskunde gestudeerd. Ik ben professioneel coach vrouwelijk leiderschap &
leiderschapsontwikkeling èn initiatiefneemster van zelfbewustzwanger.nl . Op
verschillende manieren  ben ik betrokken geraakt bij de geboortezorg: als ‘gebruiker’,
als trainer/coach voor zorgprofessionals en als adviseur voor zorgorganisaties.
Mijn droom is om in de geboortezorg de kracht van vertrouwen te versterken.
Zwanger zijn is
bij uitstek een periode in je leven waar het gaat om het inzetten van vrouwelijk leiderschap! Ik deel graag mijn expertise als coach vrouwelijk leiderschap om zwangere vrouwen te ondersteunen bij het bouwen aan een krachtig zelfvertrouwen.
Ik werk samen met een fantastisch team. Daarnaast zijn inhoudelijk ook betrokken bij het materiaal en de positionering van dit initiatief mijn adviseurs: Elske Feitsma (moeder, zwanger, yogadocent) Jeroen van Dillen (vader, gynaecoloog), Angela Verbeeten (moeder, verloskundige JUNO), Maike Gregoor (moeder, directeur Kraamzorg Liemerscare), Kim Boersma (moeder, adviseur conceptontwikkeling en positionering).


Ons plan van aanpak?
Welke stappen
gaan we zetten?
Afgelopen 3
maanden hebben ruim 600 zwangeren en reeds bevallen vrouwen en hun partners
aangegeven waar het online programma wat hun betreft over moet gaan. Er staat
een team van professionals klaar om circa 20 video’s te gaan ontwikkelen en
opnemen.
Projectplanning:
12 JUNI:
lancering crowdfunding
15 JUNI-6 JULI:
ontwikkelen en opnemen van de video’s. Bouwen van de online Academy waar het
programma straks gaat draaien.
12 JULI: Een feest ter ere van alle zelfbewuste
zwangeren en hun partners. Het moment waarop het online programma gelanceerd
wordt!

Waarom verdient zelfbewustzwanger jouw steun? Deze mensen geven antwoord:




Sabrina Reinders, nu 8 maanden zwanger! "Ik steun dit initiatief om een aantal redenen: Elke zwangerschap is anders. Elke zwangerschap is ook weer spannend. Ik vind het belangrijk dat vrouwen bewust zwanger kunnen zijn en ook vol zelfvertrouwen. Dat gaat dit programma bieden. Door vrouwen elke week, elke dag bij te helpen."

Jeroen van Dillen, gynaecoloog en vader van 4 kinderen: “Ik ondersteun dit initiatief om twee redenen: Ten eerste helpt het jonge ouders om bewust vorm te geven aan hun eigen zwangerschap en bevalling. Ten tweede helpt het ons zorgverleners aan de stem van de jonge ouders”.

Angela Verbeeten: “Als verloskundige streef ik ernaar dat moeders en vaders goed terug kunnen kijken naar de geboorte van hun kind. Daarom steun ik dit initiatief, want dit gaat ouders daarbij helpen!”

Maike Gregoor, kraamzorg LiemersCare: “Ik ondersteun dit initiatief omdat ik het belangrijk vind dat zwangeren weten dat ze een keuze mogen maken.  En hierdoor met meer vertrouwen het ouderschap ingaan.”



Ook Jessica Mendel, Actrice en tv-presentatrice, bekend bij het
Nederlandse publiek doordat ze het programma CampingLife een aantal jaar
presenteerde, zet zich in voor zelfbewustzwanger!



"Ik ben Jessica
Mendels.  Momenteel zwanger van ons tweede kindje. Ik weet sinds kort dat
ik diabetes heb. En daarom is het nog belangrijker dat ik goed op mijn
gezondheid en rust let, om ook dit kindje gezond en wel op de wereld te zetten.
Om mij heen hoor ik vaak dat andere zwangere vrouwen worstelen bij het maken
van keuzes. Er zijn heel veel keuzes te maken. Daarom vind ik
zelfbeustzwanger.nl zo’n goed initiatief! Zij helpen juist de vrouwen bij het
maken van de juiste keuzes voor henzelf. Steun ook zelfbewustzwanger en doneer.
Kies een van de beloningen hier op de website. Als
mijn zwangerschap het toelaat zien we elkaar 12 juli bij het feest waar we
vieren dat we allemaal zelfbewustzwanger zijn en waar ook de partners welkom
zijn!"

story:
Short Summary

We have a clear aim at Chatterbox, to make a difference to both children and adult’s lives by connecting therapy and educational services in a fun and safe learning environment. 

This ethos lives through the services we provide and the professional nature of the Chatterbox Team. We understand that an integrated and balanced approach is essential in assisting children’s development and we are committed to finding the right solutions for every family.

Our core values are;

  • Commitment and caring
  • Professional excellence
  • Open communication

Chatterbox was opened five years ago, initially providing speech and language therapy for children. Since then, our services have expanded  to include a Playschool for children with learning and communication difficulties, Pivotal Response Therapy, Early Childhood Tutoring, a Handwriting Programme and Family Support and Social Work. We are planning to add Occupational Therapy and Hypno-psychotherapy to our existing services for both children and adults. Creating a multi-agency team allows us to provide a more integrated, accessible and personalised service for children and their families

This proposal outlines the next steps required to develop the Chatterbox range of  services. There is a genuine need in the Cayman Islands, to provide a more integrated, ‘all under one roof’ education centre that bridges the gap between children, families, specialists and schools. We need a new property with more space, including an outside area, and a multi-sensory environment  (MSE) to progress.

Chatterbox is well established and in a unique position to lead the way in therapy and education locally. The next steps for the business rely on investment to secure an appropriate premises, without raising our fees, so we can provide more community related support to both children in need and also training young professionals. This has led to a proposal being developed to secure additional funding externally. We anticipate that by delivering the terms outlined in this proposal, we can impact 4 times as many families. More importantly though, we can provide a portfolio of services, that many countries would consider as ‘normal’ education services provision, on Island. Many families rely on overseas support, which is a costly and, therefore, exclusive option. 

Chatterbox can impact the lives of many children and families directly, swiftly and with a relatively conservative budget. 


What’s Needed to Move Forward

In order to provide a more comprehensive assessment and therapy centre, we need to move to new premises with more space and specialised equipment available for children and their families.

We are seeking several levels of investment:

•  $75,000 to make the move possible and support a down payment on a new facility. Chatterbox already has a stable customer base and income to cover the anticipated mortgage payments and running costs.

•  $25,000 for renovations to the new property, including both interior and outdoor areas, to provide a safe and fun environment for children and their families.

•  $50,000 to ensure the new space includes a fully functional multi-sensory environment room. This investment would include lighting, sound and sensory equipment that can be utilised for a variety of therapeutic interventions for both children and adults.

Chatterbox needs more space and specialised resources, indoors and outdoors, to be able to work with more families.

It’s that simple.

The initial $100,000 (down payment and renovations monies) is the main funding focus in the development process. The move to a new facility could be made before the second phase of the funding to develop a multi-sensory environment is complete.

The development of the centre including a fully functional multi-sensory environment could be implemented over time, as funding permits.


Why Should You Support Chatterbox?

What’s unique about Chatterbox is there isn’t anything like this in the Cayman Islands. Whilst what is being proposed isn’t ahead of the market elsewhere in the world, it is certainly forward thinking within the region and is grounded in a sound theoretical base, inspired by family-centred practice, Hanen child-centred programmes, Snoezelen sensory integration methods and a holistic, multi-disciplinary approach to working with children with special needs .

The Chatterbox Team is already well established – this is not a new business start up, but the funds raised will go to improving what is a proven therapy and education business model. 



The Impact

When a child is identified as requiring an assessment by parents, an educator or a physician, they will be referred to a specialised education centre for diagnosis, therapy and support. Children’s Centres are made up of a multidisciplinary team, consisting (typically) of paediatricians, speech and language therapists, occupational therapists, physiotherapists, advisory teachers and clinical and educational psychologists. A comprehensive centre will also have trained family support workers to liaise between the child, their school, doctors and any additional professionals involved in providing therapy or educational programmes. The family support worker/social workers creating a much needed anchor, critical to providing the holistic outlook and consistent management for everyone invested in the child’s development needs.

The journey from initial assessment through to therapy can be an emotional one for parents. If a child has complex developmental needs, the assessment process and amount of people involved can become overwhelming. Chatterbox provides an integrated and multidisciplinary approach, so each individual child and their families are provided with the right solutions, carefully tailored to their needs. This level of support requires significant investment in both staff and facilities.

We are looking to provide a first class multi-disciplinary team and facility to help children with special needs and their families.

We estimate there are 300 families in need of support each year locally. By expanding our services and working closely with other relevant care professionals, we can improve our services to a) provide a greater capacity and b) increase capabilities. The aim would be to increase our current support by 200%.

There are no private multi-sensory environment facilities in the Cayman Islands. This would be a groundbreaking development and would provide what is considered a ‘normal’ therapeutic service in the USA, UK and Europe.

Chatterbox proposes two community-related proposed outcomes after acquiring  the needed funding:

1)  The provision of a scholarship scheme, providing free of charge support to a selected number of children with the highest need and limited funds.

2)  Providing internships to young Caymanians, interested in working in this field. Local training in this area is extremely limited and therefore internships would be extremely beneficial.


Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk to the project is not finding an appropriate facility to move to. An outdoor learning and play space is key to developing the Playschool capacity, so more children can be supported during their early years.

The Playschool currently has space for six children, who benefit from learning through play in a small, language-enriched environment. In a larger space, more children could be offered this specialised learning environment, in several small groups. A number of premises have been identified to mitigate the risk of not being able to move. The challenge will be identifying the right premises and ensuring the funding is in place to secure a swift purchase.


Other Ways You Can Help

Funding is the main requirement for this project - however we would gladly receive design and planning support.

story:
What's EOS-Book?

EOS-Book is a digital monthly and independent magazine (available in PDF, ePub and mobi) about Electronics and Technology, it is based on a current project: an Italian blog called Elettronica Open Source.

Since 2012, it has become a point of reference magazine in Italy for Engineers, Technology addicts/lovers, makers, etc, focusing  on technical articles about electronics, technology and other subjects, such as mathematics, physics and astrophysics to satisfy our readers' every need.

Readers can find all the main topics together with other important subjects such as Arduino, Raspberry Pi, Embedded board, Programming, Robotics, Science, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, IoT, Wearable, PCB, Android, Linux, DIY. It has also a section dedicated to 3D Printer. How to choose a 3D Printer, is an example of one of the most popular articles in 2014 for our Italian users.

In the following picture you will see the Italian version cover of June 2015 EOS-Book issue. With your support, we would like to translate this issue into English.

Our technical projects include different electronic fields such as FTPmicro temperature monitor, how to send data to Google Doc Spreadsheets with Picmicro

Moreover, in the following picture you will find an example of basic Electronics. You can see the schematic of a simple and Open Source project about a self-learning electronic resistive key:

In the picture below you will find a layout of a PCB of a remote receiver with 2 relays:

In the other picture, you can see an abstract of the firmware code of the same project.

The following image represents the main picture of an article on IoT, How to automatically turn on the heater of your house as you enter in your neighborhood!

These are just few examples of issues that we are planning to translate.

The magazine is published monthly and and every Technical Article will be available on preview in a membership area of our Blog.

Thanks to the success in the Italian market, we would like to replicate the same model into English with a specific blog and magazine.

Our writing and editorial team is made up of Electronic Engineers and experts with professional backgrounds in electronics, physics and technology.  The distinctive feature of our project is a direct feedback with all authors, they are available on the blog for any request and/or to elucidate doubts.

What do you think about it? It is interesting, don't you think?

Our Team

The editorial team of EOS-Book is composed of:

    
Emanuele Bonanni 

Electronics designer for over 20 years and Blogger since 2006. CEO&Founder of Elettronica Open Source. He has developed avionics, railway, medical, industrial and consumer applications. He is an expert in microcontrollers and circuits design, he has been consultant and/or partner of companies such as Microchip, Freescale, Renesas and Quantum Qprox.
Here you can find a video of Emanuele during the Better Embbedded 2014.

Sara Ercolani
She studied Literature, Publishing and Communication Strategy at the University of Rome. She had several experiences in the field of communication and she has always been fond of technology. She is currently working as Community Manager and Costumer Care at Elettronica Open Source.

Maurizio di Paolo Emilio
PhD in Physics and Telecommunications Engineer, he collaborates with various technical and scientific journals and with the University of L'Aquila in the field of X-ray and high-voltage systems as software and hardware designer. He is the author of three books (Data Acquisition System from fundamental to applied design; Embedded system design for high speed data acquisition and control system; Thermal effects in optical systems: compensation of the thermal effects in core optics of the gravitational wave detector Virgo) and many scientific and technical publications in the field of electronic design, Linux, PCBs and embedded systems. Here you can find a video of Maurizio about Energy Harvesting.

What We Need & What You Get

In the following paragraph we will describe our idea on how to financially support us with the English project and on how to make it real!

All funding received will be used to create the English website and to reimburse all the people that will be working on this project: our writers, our editors, our graphic designer, our communication staff and costumer care staff.

If you want to help us you can choose among one of these perks:

$19 (EARLY EARLY BIRD) -- with this perk you will receive a two years' subscription to EOS-Book, 24 issues in PDF, ePub and mobi and you can save $30 OFF the standard price of $49. You will be allowed to get access to the exclusive area of the website to read the full article and discuss in the comments section with our authors.

$24 (EARLY BIRD) -- with this perk you will receive a two years' subscription to EOS-Book, 24 issues in PDF, ePub and mobi. You will pay only $1 for each issue and you can save $25 OFF the standard price of $49. You will be allowed to get access to the exclusive area of the website to read the full article and discuss in the comments section with our authors.

$39 (exclusive price for indiegogo users) -- with this perk you will receive a two years' subscription to EOS-Book, 24 issues in PDF, ePub and mobi. You will pay only $1.60 for each issue and you can save $10 OFF the standard price of $49. You will be allowed to get access to the exclusive area of the website to read the full article and discuss in the comments section with our authors.

$49 (standard price) -- with this perk you will receive a two years' subscription to EOS-Book, 24 issues. You will pay $2.04 for each issue! You will be allowed to get access to the exclusive area of the website to read the full article and discuss in the comments section with our authors.

In any case, you will receive your first EOS-Book after 15 days by the end of the campaign. It is a very short time compared to any other crowdfunding campaign. 

Our peculiarity

We have just talked about EOS-Book, but we would like to focus on our distinctive feature: the direct contact with authors. This was in fact the reason behind the success of the Italian Magazine and the distinguishing element that makes it different from all other magazines available on the market.

We would like to duplicate the Italian model: our Premium Articles are written by Electronics Engineers and experts, before the pubblication in the EOS-Book, they will first be published in preview on the blog in the membership area.

Through the blog, users can interact with all authors in the comments section. The authors of the articles are available to provide any information and to clarify any doubt.

Furthermore, inside the magazine there are no advertising pages (so we are completely independent!) and each magazine is made up about 50 pages.

Risks & Challenges

There is no risk! Yes, that's right! It is a crowdfunding campaign that has no risks.

The project already successfully exists in Italian, we just want to replicate it.

During these days we are planning all articles and focusing on the first release of the EOS-Book, our authors are already working on translations. In fact, many of them have already published contents in English.

We are available in the comments section to answer to your questions and doubts.

Other Ways To Help Us

If you can't support and fund our project, you can help us make it real by sharing it with your friends!
story_txt:
What's EOS-Book?


EOS-Book is a digital monthly and independent magazine (available in PDF, ePub and mobi) about Electronics and Technology, it is based on a 
current project: an Italian blog called Elettronica Open Source.
Since 2012, it has become a
point of reference magazine in Italy for Engineers, Technology addicts/lovers, makers, etc, focusing  on technical articles about electronics, technology and other subjects, such as mathematics, physics and astrophysics to satisfy our
readers' every need.


Readers
can find all the main topics together with other important subjects
such as Arduino, Raspberry Pi, Embedded board, Programming, Robotics, Science, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, IoT, Wearable, PCB, Android, Linux, DIY. It
has also a section dedicated to 3D Printer. How to choose a 3D Printer, is
an example of one of the most popular articles in 2014 for our
Italian users.





In
the following picture you will see the Italian version cover of  June
2015 EOS-Book issue. With your support, we would like to translate this
issue into English.






Our
technical projects include different electronic fields such as FTPmicro temperature monitor, how to send data to Google Doc Spreadsheets with Picmicro



Moreover, in
the following picture you will find an example of basic Electronics. You
can see the schematic of a simple and Open Source project about a
self-learning electronic resistive key:





In
the picture below you will find a layout of a PCB of a remote
receiver with 2 relays:


In
the other picture, you can see an abstract of the firmware code of
the same project.




The following image represents the main picture of an article on IoT, How to automatically turn on the heater of your house as you enter in your neighborhood!






These
are just few examples of issues that we are planning to translate.
The magazine is published monthly and and
every Technical Article will be available
on preview in a membership area of our Blog.
Thanks to the success in the Italian market, we would like to replicate the same model into
English with a specific blog and magazine.
Our writing and editorial team is made up of Electronic Engineers and experts with professional backgrounds in electronics, physics and technology.  The
distinctive feature of our project is a direct feedback with all
authors, they are available on the blog for any request and/or to
elucidate doubts.
What
do you think about it? It is interesting, don't you think?
Our Team
The editorial team of EOS-Book is composed of:

    


Emanuele Bonanni 

Electronics designer for over 20 years and Blogger since 2006. CEO&Founder of Elettronica Open Source. He has developed avionics, railway, medical, industrial and consumer applications. He
is an expert in microcontrollers and circuits design, he has been
consultant and/or partner of companies such as Microchip, Freescale,
Renesas and Quantum Qprox. Here you can find a video of Emanuele during the Better Embbedded 2014.


Sara Ercolani
She studied Literature, Publishing and Communication Strategy at the University of Rome. She had several experiences in the field of communication and she has always been fond of technology. She is currently working as Community Manager and Costumer Care at Elettronica Open Source.


Maurizio di Paolo Emilio
PhD in Physics and Telecommunications Engineer, he collaborates with various technical and scientific journals and with the University of L'Aquila in the field of X-ray and high-voltage systems as software and hardware designer. He is the author of three books (Data Acquisition System from fundamental to applied design; Embedded system design for high speed data acquisition and control system; Thermal effects in optical systems: compensation of the thermal effects in core optics of the gravitational wave detector Virgo) and
many scientific and technical publications in the field of electronic design, Linux, PCBs and embedded systems. Here you can find a video of Maurizio about Energy Harvesting.

story:
Dear friends, supporters and donors,

My name is Lavinia Marin and at the end of June, this year, I let myself out of the media as a journalist, in order to engage myself in teaching Yoga for Children. I consider this work the best way to take care of my community and the well-being of the future generations. It was a big step for me. First of all, I chose a different lifestyle: to be healthy, balanced and happy by doing what I like, what I love, and being able to help others, in the same time.

During last years, in order to find balance in the challanging environment of media, I was practicing daily meditation and Hatha Yoga. That literally kept me alive and helped me succesfully manage my advanced fatigue, insomnia and frequent migraines. By gaining back my health and being able to blossom again after almost 5 hard years, now I'm more than happy to share this knowledge and practice with children and adults in search for a healthy body and mind. The new strength I found inside me gave me the courage to open myself to a new path in managing my life and my well-being. 

Last year, in October, with the support of a dear friend of mine, I succesfully followed a teacher training program in Yoga for Children. This new perspective made me give up my struggle to keep working in a stressful and unhealthy environment . This is the reason why I sincerely feel that I should give my whole energy, time and soul to becoming a good teacher and increase awareness for a healthy way of living, starting with the well-being  of the little ones. Finally, that’s my way to honour the discipline that truly saved my life. 

Step by step, I began to discover more and more about taking care of myself and those around me. In March, this year, I began to practice also Sundao tradition, originally from South Korea, which is happily coming together with my Yoga practice. "Whole Body Whole Person" - Body and mind integral children and young adult life supporting program based on Sundao practice gave me a different educational approach with wonderful tools and principles to work with children. 

Teaching Yoga to Children is the most absolute fulfilling job I have ever done. It fills me with joy and happiness. And, deep in my heart, I know that this it the best way to help the new generation – building strength and peace in a whole different perspective. Being strong and successful not by stress, struggle, conflict or competition, by loosing your mind and your health. But by being calm, at peace, shining and silently powerful. By being beautiful. And healthy.


In order to make this huge shift for me, to give space and time to this new way of practice in my life, I need your financial support. Not for long, but just to pass through this transition period of time and then gaining my financial support happily doing my work with children. For now, I need more money to buy all kind of playing tools and musical instruments (which I use in the various games during one hour of practice), for books, sometimes for yoga mats, and also to participate in workshops for therapy with children or seminars.

Now I'm teaching Yoga for Children as a volunteer in an open library, which has many wonderful programs for children. Next month, I will also have the opportunity to teach in a new library, as a volunteer. And although the perspective of being payed for this wonderful job is still faraway, I'm willing to do this because is far more important for the children to have free acces to this amazing and beneficial discipline.

This is the reason I kindly ask you to stand by me and be part of this beautiful and useful discipline for children. Your support will help me to keep this education alive, to continue my progress in this journey and to sustain my living costs with rent, traveling expenses in educational purpuses, taking part in workshops and seminars, be able to provide good teaching in Yoga for Children.


I will be very happy to keep you update with the steps of my journey. You may find photos of my work here https://www.facebook.com/pages/Yoga-pentru-Copi...

May that more and more children and adults truly enjoy a new, free, healthy and happy life through yoga and meditation! Please, feel free to share with your friends my call and my story.

I deeply thank you for your open heart and support! Namaste!

Sincerely,
Lavinia Marin
Certified Yoga for Children Teacher

story:
My name is Chiara, and I'm from Rome, Italy.
As far as I can remember, I have always been in singing, acting and dancing. When I was little, I used to stand up on my chair at dinner time for saying poems. That was my spotlight, and everyone was looking at me and clapping at me. My recurring daydream was to be on a stage, running my own concert, singing and dancing for a cheering audience. 

When I was eight, my parents signed me up for an English-drama school. Since then, I've been performing in several different shows. Then, in high school, I started having private singing lessons, and I joined an amateur company. I remember coming home one day, at the age of 15, thinking "this is what I want to do for the rest of my life!". A couple of years later, I realised my life could actually hover over musical theatre and that's where the "London dream" started. But it's only at the age of 19 that I finally took courage and decided to come to London for a month, join a couple of courses and see how it felt. Well, the moment I landed I knew this was my place. Now, after nearly one year, I got accepted in a school called KSA Academy of Performing Arts and I finally got the chance I have been dreaming of for so long: training as a professional. As some of you may know, London is a very expensive city and I would need some help to make my dream come true. My family is in Rome and being alone here can get very difficult at times, expecially moneywise. 

The first year rate is £8.250. Any extra money will be used for living expenses (rent, food, etc.)

Thank you to anyone who has decided to help me, it means a lot to me.

story:
Short Summary

Secular Humanist Society of East Texas sponsored East Texas' first ever secular centered convention in September 2014. We are now back in action and planning an even bigger convention due to commence October 3, 2015.

    This years speaker line-up:

    • Matt Dillahunty- The Atheist Experience
    • Beth Presswood-  Godless Bitches podcast
    • JT Eberhard- Writer and co-founder of Skepticon 
    • Heina Dadabhoy- Writer/Blogger for Freethoughtblogs.com
    • Hugo and Jake- Comedians and Youtube hosts of The Bible Reloaded


What We Need & What You Get

We need to reach a goal of $3000 to host Freethought 2015. Every contribution matters and is well appreciated. Help us bring together like-minded individuals of the secular community in East Texas.

The Impact

Last year Freethought sold over 300 tickets. We were enlightened by some of the most inspirational voices of the freethinking community. Last years speakers included:
  • Matt Dillahunty- The Atheist Experience Host
  • Beth Presswood- Godless Bitches podcast
  • Jerry DeWitt- Author of "Hope After Faith"
  • Aron Ra- Texas State Director of American Atheists
  • Kathleen Johnson- Vice President of American Atheists
  • Brent Burt- Ecologist and Evolutionary Biologist

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot donate, please share this with your friends and family. Your support and voice matters.

story:
Reef Check's mission is to preserve the oceans and reefs of the world through research, education and conservation. Reef Check - with operations in dozens of countries - is the only organization that monitors reefs along the entire coast of California and around the globe. 


Why does this matter? Because...

  • 600 million people rely directly on reefs for their survival 
  • Reefs are the nurseries of the sea 
  • Tourism, the largest global industry, relies heavily on reefs
  • Reefs protect coastlines and cities from storms and tsunamis
  • The most effective drug for childhood leukemia was derived from a Caribbean sponge, and many more miracle drugs are currently in development
  • The marine economy in California contributes around $40 billion to the State each year.

Education:

Both internationally and in our home state of California, we educate students - from elementary school through university - about the marine environment. In 2012, Reef Check's episode of PBS' "SciGirls" won a Daytime Emmy Award.

Currently, 50% of school children in Los Angeles have never put a toe in the ocean, even though it's our city's "backyard." How can we expect future generations to preserve something that they know nothing about?

In California, we intend to expand our education program by reaching out to underserved, elementary through junior high school students in the Los Angeles Unified School district. Specifically, we will bring thousands of these kids to our headquarters in Fisherman's Village in Marina del Rey to learn about ocean life by seeing and touching live organisms.


What We Need

We need to purchase the following equipment to facilitate interactive learning:
  • Two 12 foot long touch tanks with stands :                       $6,200
  • Two 600 gallon display aquaria with stands:                    $4,000
  • Pumps, heaters, coolers and filtration systems:              $8,000
  • 14 aquarium lights:                                                                           $1,800


Perks


and more, including...

Two very special naming opportunities.


The Impact

Our planned education program, which these aquaria and touch tanks will make possible, will provide LA school kids with the opportunity to experience first-hand marine species such as sea stars, sea urchins, sea cucumbers, crabs, mussels, rock fish and small sharks. In addition to species indigenous to California, we will also introduce them to tropical species.


Risks & Challenges

While there are always risks and challenges in caring for marine species, Reef Check has an on-site marine biologist, as well as other highly-trained staff, to care for the  fish and invertebrates in the aquaria and touch tanks.


On behalf of LA's school kids, thank you for your support!

story: I've committed to raising awareness and funds to support Alzheimer's care, support and research, and I need your help. Together, we can become an unstoppable force against Alzheimer's disease. You can help with a donation!
story_txt: I've committed to raising awareness and funds to support Alzheimer's care, support and research, and I need your help. Together, we can become an unstoppable force against Alzheimer's disease. You can help with a donation!

story:
My name is Brittany. I'm 25 years old, and I am raising money to help fund my tuition at Dalhousie University.

When I started my studies at Dalhousie University, I was terrified. Everything was new. New province, new city, new apartment, new academic experience, and no friends or family around if I fell on my face. It even rained for the entire first week after I arrived. But it was also exciting.

Being the first person in my family to attempt university, I had a lot of family members who were proud that I was taking such a big leap so far away from home. My first class on the first day made a huge impression on me: "I am going to love it here." Soon after that, I declared a double major in History and Russian Studies, and managed to maintain a GPA above 3.5 (grade A, or 90% roughly).

My first year passed by in a flash. I stayed in Halifax throughout the Christmas and summer holidays to make sure I wouldn't come up short for cash at the end of the school year, since student loans are always rather tight. I got to visit my hometown once for two weeks, and was running everywhere; I couldn't even fit in everyone I wanted to see. I looked forward to when I would be able to properly afford going home for a longer stay than two weeks, so I could see my friends and family.

Entering my second year, just before my birthday in October, I received devastating news: My great grandfather had passed away suddenly. I rushed to get a flight back home that day.  I hadn't seen him for a little over a year, and had only been able to talk with him very occasionally while in school (he suffered from hearing loss, and had difficulties talking on the phone.) Shortly after, I learned he would be buried on my birthday.

This dealt a crushing blow to me. It not only affected me emotionally, but badly impacted my funds for school with an expensive flight home, and it happened right during midterm season. With the advice and support of my professors, I decided to take some time to recover, and come back ready to tackle my academics with vigor.

As the time comes for me to return to my studies, the problem is funding. Due to my emergency move back to Ontario, and the sudden withdrawal from classes, my student debt is, and will be, higher than anticipated for my undergraduate education. I now need to afford another move, tuition, a new apartment, and still be able to make it through the academic year with food and supplies.

Why does it cost so much?

One year of undergraduate study in the Arts and Social Sciences at Dalhousie University looks like this:

(Taken directly from Dalhousie's Money Matters web page.)

This is why I've decided to seek assistance through crowdfunding. My goal is to earn enough funds to cover my tuition, a place to live, my one time moving fees, and food for the year. My great grandfather was the world to me, and I was happy to be able to tell him I was going to university. When he said he was proud of me, it made me determined to make sure I was successful. I'm attending university for myself, my own dreams, and he was always supportive of that. I want to carry that support to the finish line, so I can take my degree to where he's buried. Even if he can't see it.

story:
It's time... to remember that tragedy nurtures the good in all of us.

The Chardon Living Memorial Park was conceived by a community of supporters that suffered a tragedy and wanted to give something back to the survivors and the community.

On February 27, 2012, a school shooting occurred which resulted in children that lost their lives, families that lost loved ones, friends that lost schoolmates. A tragedy that redefined what was normal for a small community.

Concerned citizens have bonded together to provide a historic record, honor the innocent victims and deliver a message of hope for generations to come. This park is designed to provide a place for reflection and create spiritual awareness. The effort is to upgrade a walking trail, create an outdoor fitness area and a children’s playground complete with commemoration plaques and a welcoming statue.

Design

It's time... to see the land transform and flourish.

A significant amount of requirement definition, design and engineering has occurred before and while the project plan was developed. We will assure adherence to the plan and will make sure all project deliverables meet the user and functional requirements to the best of our ability. We are emphatic about the need for regulation and responsibility associated with the design and implementation of our ultimate goal.

The Land

We have currently worked toward obtaining the property for the site of the Chardon Living Memorial Park. As seen on maps and designs we are working with the city of Chardon property and the Chardon School System to meet their respective needs and perspective.

We are currently accepting donations to design and build a first-class facility that will include the following:

  • A refurbished trail suitable for runners, walkers and hikers
  • Designed signposts, benches and plaques as tribute to the three victims that lost their lives, a dedicated space for the survivors and a plaque dedicated to the first responders
  • An outdoor fitness center with ADA accessible stations
  • An outdoor play center for children located on Chardon school grounds
  • A statue as a greeting to the facility which will include a map of the grounds
  • Connecting trails for the three venues above

It's time... and with your donation, we can make this park come to life!

The Chardon Living Memorial Park creates an opportunity to provide something positive in response to the tragedy in Chardon, Ohio. The park will be a gathering area where all may actively participate in moving forward, but never forgetting. We are ready to build our new park facilities, but we will not start construction until we raise our monetary goal of $300,000.

story:
Website:

www.mindgamesawards.com

Win up to $250.000 for solving riddles!!!

Mind Games Awards( MGA ) is a collection of mind games such as riddles, puzzles, brain teasers and much more. MGA is all about rewarding people who are able to solve simple or more complex mind games

Mind Games Awards Competition is the main activity of MGA. Every two months a Mind Game competition takes place. Contestants have to solve some Mind Games, riddles , puzzles and brain teasers. The top 3 smartest contestants win the corresponding rewards. The Mind Games Awards Competition forms are released at a specified time. Contestants must submit their solution as fast as possible. The first 3 that are correct will be the winners. An annual competition will take place as well.

Mind Games Awards Application is an application that will support the overall experience of MGA.

MGA Smartphone Game is a social game that will be focused on riddles, brain teasers and puzzles in a way that will connect people.

* We need your support to continue

** Currently Working on:

1) Completing the website

2) Completing the competition details

3) Organizing first competition.

4) Starting Smartphone MGA Application

5) Starting Smartphone MGA GAME

6) Starting MGA Store

7) Getting recognition from related organizations

Like Our Page On Facebook:

https://www.facebook.com/mindgameawards

Follow Us On Twitter:

https://twitter.com/MindGamesAwards

 Think, Solve, Earn

story:
Short Summary

The Internet School of Magic is my dream to spend my life helping people as a teacher, healer, and activist. For me, this means providing spiritual guidance, training in specific and advanced skills of occult practice, critical thinking, and philosophy, and performing shamanic healings. Moreover, I am a critical activist, which means I want to help the world by winning key struggles to protect the planet and its people from exploitation and abuse. The School is my platform for teaching and healing as well as a hub for critical activism, networking, and activist education. Much more about the School and my other projects and forthcoming books can be found at the website, linked above.

I am a psychologist, scientist, programmer, and writer studying Sapience and Initiation. Sapience is the ineffable quality that makes us human, and initiation is the process of welcoming people into the human condition and to sapience. I have studied both of these phenomena for ten years as I acquired first a Psychology degree at University of Washington and then a master's in Educational Technology & Educational Psychology at Michigan State University. I studied critical pedagogy and pedagogical ethics during my time at MSU, at the PhD level. My passion is to heal the world, one illuminated mind and strengthened will at a time.

What I Need & What You Get

The funds from this indiegogo campaign will be used to travel to the X-Day and Starwood festivals in July, 2015, in Ohio. Starwood is the largest pagan festival in the United States, and X-Day is a very cheap festival for my church at the same location just before that. Both events will be full of people in my primary audience: the neopagan community. At these events, I hope to find the ~8 additional students I need to support myself working on the School full-time. I will also meet with the headmaster of the Grey School of Wizardry in California, the legendary Oberon Zell-Ravenheart, and talk about running a school of magic with him.

Here is a detailed budget:

  • $238—Round-trip bus ticket Seattle-Michigan
  • $35—X-Day ticket
  • $195—Starwood ticket
  • $165—Gas to X-Day and Starwood (fueleconomy.gov estimates + 25% buffer)
  • $400—Food for 20 days ($20/day)
  • $100—Safety buffer for travel
  • $25—500 business cards
  • $25—Ad in Starwood's booklet
  • $150—Cover indiegogo's fees and credit card fees (8-14% total)
Total: $1,501

The Internet School of Magic is beginning with me teaching weekly classes and helping clients improve their lives. There are big plans for its expansion (see below). Your contribution will help to launch the School at a pivotal time!

You will receive the perks listed in the sidebar. I believe in a gift economy and in the importance of not turning anyone away seeking spiritual guidance or relief, so I am attempting to run the school on a donation/slide-scale basis. This indiogogo campaign is part of that dream of running the finances for my business in a fully ethical fashion that makes my services available to all. I am excited to meet each new client/student/donor, so please feel free to contact me immediately after you have made your pledge.

If the fundraising goal is not met, the funds will still be used to finance a trip to part of the listed events, if possible. I will still use that time to make connections and advertise the School, but I will not be able to attend both X-Day and Starwood. If the funds are inadequate to finance the trip at all, I will use the funds for living expenses as I continue to work on growing and advertising the school full-time.

What is Critical Activism?

Critical activism means that I try to work on the highest leverage points. This is why I went into Psychology in the first place: because for me, the highest leverage point is the enlightenment of one individual mind at a time. It is incredibly difficult—but fully possible—to help someone become more awake and aware, and mastering this skill is my primary area of research. I study sapience—the ineffeble quality that makes us human—and initation, the beginning of things and the process of welcoming new humans to life and sapience. In other words, I study how to smoothly, quickly, and painlessly pop people out of the Matrix. Critical activism is the much broader project of trying to pop everyone out of the Matrix at once—to do this, we must create a decentralized, peer-education movement which can spread the political wisdom and conversation needed to end the reign of Fox News and the spectacle of lies citizens are presented with by corrupt institutions. This is post-Occupy activism intended to win.

You can see some of the community work I have been doing by visiting the subreddit /r/sorceryofthespectacle. I am the primary admin of this subreddit, and I have been carefully nourishing the community since its inception with careful curation and by writing posts intended to nudge the community in constructive directions. This subreddit is fairly representative of the type of perspective I bring to bear in the School of Magic as well: described recently by one redditor as "the intersection where post-structuralism and the occult meet", my research is far beyond accusations commonly leveled at occultism (nonsense, useless, or unrigorous) or academia (out-of-touch, pretentious, or inaccessible). This is why I call my approach critical occultism and critical activism: I take the most holistic, complex, contemporary perspectives I can find, and I combine and collate them with the most ancient, specialized, or encoded perspectives I can understand. All of this research is streamlined with the single-minded goal of application in helping people and creating political and self-educational victories for the 99%.

This is one reason that I named this project the "Internet" School of Magic, and why I describe myself as a "co-founder" even though I am the sole founder of this particular project: collating many perspectives like this, including neuroscience, psychology, comparative religion, shamanism, critical theory, many occult traditions, etc. is a process of looking not at the similarities or dissimilarities between systems, but rather at the gaps between them and the meaning of those gaps. I call this method critical transyncretism because it attempts to bridge the disconnect between a perennialist approach, which loses historical detail and tends to appropriate cultural specificity, and a genealogical or purely analytic approach, which loses relevance to any human passion. This is the 'inter-' part of the School. The Internet is a new thing, and it has and will continue to create a new planetary consciousness—the Internet School of Magic is one of many projects that are raising this consciousness and attempting to unite the people of Earth behind a banner of love and solidarity, against the few despots who continue to oppress us.

Impact & Future Directions

The Internet School of Magic has only just officially launched, but I am already helping my clients and students become stronger, more balanced, and more capable in handling their lives. Every client that comes to me gets a warm, personal interaction where I give them customized magical/conceptual tools for their situation. Several clients so far have expressed deep thanks for the support and advice I was able to offer during a trying time. (The details are confidential and obviously, my services are not intended as treatment for mental health. I am a positive psychologist so I focus on radically building strengths.)

This project may start small, but I have big plans for expansion. At first, the School will exist as me teaching classes and helping clients. Here are some later projects that I will start once I am able to work on the School and its expansion full-time:

  • TEAM—The Transliminal Earth Alliance Metanarrative: A project to create a set of viral protocols for critical activism and mutual education. This will be a project of viral illuminati education. (This project is already being developed behind-the-scenes.)
  • JANUS—The Jobs Action Network for Underappreciated Scholars: Philosophy & other liberal arts departments are under attack, and searching for a job in these fields is a soulcrushing experience. Let's change that by creating a highly-efficient network for job distribution and campaigning for better philosophy-related jobs!
  • Moonlight Software—Software development arm of the School. I study interface design and how screens condition subjectivity. Eventually, advanced "moonlight" apps will be developed which are intended for use either at night or in altered states. These apps will help students to train their minds in ways that have never been attempted before with a software interface. These apps will also be designed to help enter, exit, and navigate altered states, i.e., "digital drugs".
  • Global Hostel Travel Network—Eventually, I would like to try establishing a global network of teachers, students, and hostels in order to make global learning an affordable experience. Using flocking algorithms, we can route teachers and interested students to shared locales so that ad-hoc meetups can form between interested peers and teachers. Just a seed of an idea now, this network has the potential to compete with big universities by offering a global learning and travel experience for a fraction of the price.
  • Critical Psychiatry and Patients' Rights—The psychiatric patients locked up or drugged into normalcy are our generation's shamans, prophets, and poets—and rather than being welcomed into a world of artists/priests/poets/prophets, our weird friends are being locked up in a sort of Azkaban. By advocating for patients' rights and by publicly using a language of magic, I hope to build alternative powers that can help people during spiritual crisis without drugs or coercion and with a mythic ear.

Risks & Challenges

Starting something like "The Internet School of Magic" is an absurdly risky career move. It's easy to criticize me as a charlatan or an insane and deluded new-age crystal-waver. However, I think my education speaks for itself: I studied Psychology at University of Washington, and and I studied Educational Psychology & Educational Technology at the PhD level in Michigan (left early with a master's). I have studied critical theory and critical approaches to activism and pedagogy extensively.

The primary actual challenge for me in lauching this school is getting enough donating students to support myself with the School as my primary income. This will allow me to dedicate all of my time to the School—expanding the curriculum, networking with activists and other teachers, and starting the social and political projects I have in the pipeline—rather than having to spend my days worrying about how I will pay the bills. Right now I have 4 paying students, and if I were able to triple that number, I think I would be just fine and and would consider the school "launched".

Therefore, I encourage you to consider your donation a buying-in to the school as a new student (or a client requesting other services such as healing or technical exorcism). Ongoing students who are able to offer the suggested $20/class at four classes per month will be the lifeblood of the School in its early stages.

If I fail in this push to launch the school with this indiegogo campaign, I will have to take a day job in order to make ends meet. This will greatly slow down the launching of the school as a standalone business, since I will have less time to devote to advertising and may have limited time for existing clients, as well. Please help me to meet the fundraising goal so I can move ahead on my dream job at full speed!

Other Ways You Can Help

The best way you can help is to become a student at the $20/class level—and if you can make an $80 or more contribution to this campaign, that will start your first month of classes! However, there are other ways to help as well:
  • Share this campaign with your friends.
  • Ask your friends who might be interested in my classes or other services to check out my website. Follow up and let them know I need new students now :-). Maybe you have friends who are pagan, interested in the occult, or into conspiracy theories or "the illuminati"—all these topics fall within my research, as well as the neuroscience of self-awareness, for example.
  • Buy your friend a class as a gift—$20 is the suggested price per class for the first month of classes, and I would be happy to send them an additional free class, which I offer to all new students.
  • My website, internetschoolofmagic.com does not yet work well on small screens. I can fix this problem myself eventually, but if some kind web designer wants to donate their services to helping me fix this problem—or even helping me to spruce up the site with a nicer design in general—I would be very grateful, as it would save me 40+ hours learning how to make my website follow standards of "responsive web design".
  • Put up a sign or poster in your business or workplace with my website.
  • Even if you can't offer any money, please feel free to come to me with your questions or spiritual issues. Maybe I can help you get to a place where you are able to afford a donation :-). I love helping people so it's very exciting to have people to help.
Thank you very much for reading and if you haven't yet, please check out internetschoolofmagic.com and consider making a donation or becoming a student! Donations made through this campaign are best, because if the goal is met, the fees will be cut in half!
